english.segment1: Things are looking up, oh, finally. I thought I'd never see the day when you smile at me. We always pull through, oh, when we try. I'm always wrong but you're never right. Oh, you're never right
english.segment2: Honestly, can you believe we crossed. The world while it's asleep?. I'd never trade it in 'cause I've always wanted this. And it's not a dream anymore, no, oh, oh, oh. It's not a dream anymore, it's worth fighting for
english.segment3: Could have given up so easily. I was a few cheap shots away from the end of me. Taken for granted, 'most everything. That I would have died for just yesterday, just yesterday
